LanguageData.DebugLogTooltips: Turn on debug log. Do not use this on normal game play as it's very spammy.
LanguageData.MaxDistanceToHaulTooltips:
Only haul to storage if the distance to it is not greater than this value.
Set it to a large enough value (like 999) to allow hauling at any practical distance.
Set it to 0 if you want to disable hauling completely.
